""" UDF """

# Original SAS code:
# CASE WHEN lowcase(&ACTIVITEIT_CODE) CONTAINS 'toegewezen' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
# Auto-generated pyspark code:
from pyspark.sql.functions import udf
from pyspark.sql.types import IntegerType


@udf(returnType=IntegerType())
def cz_sas_br_t_ma_toegewezen_idc(activiteit_code) -> int:
    if activiteit_code is not None and "toegewezen" in activiteit_code.lower():
        return 1
    return 0
